formalpara.title: Interner Hilfetext zu dieser Applikation in Asterisk 1.4:

para.screen:
-= Info about application 'EndWhile' =-
[Synopsis] End a while loop
[Description] Usage: EndWhile() Return to the previous called While

formalpara.title: Differenz des internen Hilfetexts von Asterisk 1.2 zu 1.4:

para.screen:
--- in Asterisk 1.2 +++ in Asterisk 1.4 @@ -1,7 +1,7 @@ -= Info about application 'EndWhile' =-
[Synopsis] - End A While Loop + End a while loop
[Description] Usage: EndWhile()

formalpara.title: Differenz des internen Hilfetexts von Asterisk 1.4 zu 1.6:

para.screen:
--- in Asterisk 1.4 +++ in Asterisk 1.6 @@ -4,5 +4,4 @@ End a while loop
[Description] - Usage: EndWhile() - Return to the previous called While + EndWhile(): Return to the previous called While()
